Zhumadian prefecture level city in Henan
Zhumadian prefecture level city in Henan

sentences.english: So the culture of Zhumadian is also called "Tianzhong Culture ."
sentences.chinese: 駐馬店的文化也因此冠名“天中文化”。

sentences.english: He did not enter the inn.

sentences.chinese: 可是寺登街的五星級馬店。

sentences.english: The city of Zhumadian is an area with better natural conditions but less-developed economy.
sentences.chinese: 駐馬店市是一個自然條件較好但經濟欠發達的地區。
